description.narrative: National Demining Programme aims to support the mine clearing process through strengthening the IND capacity in coordinating the process, support to demining operations on the field and establishment of mechanisms to address residuals

participating-org.narrative: SDC-Swiss Agency For Development and Co

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: Nr. of Mine Free Districts; Nr. of square meters of mine suspected area; Nr. of annual mine and UXO casualties; Nr. of Provinces trained to handle residual explosive remnants of war issues; Quantity of reports and maps with sex and age disaggregated data produced and distributed.

comment.narrative: 86 Districts declared Mine Free (DEC 2011); 10.5 million sq. meters of mine suspected area (JAN2011); 15 mine/UXO related causalities recorded in 2011; Four Provinces trained to handle residual explosives remnants of war issues; 10 maps and reports produced without sex and age disaggregated data in 2011.
N/A. Project not operational. Final adjustments for due closure.
